scatter_defintion:
• SCATTER symbol appears only on Base Game.
  • SCATTER symbol appears only on reels 1, 3 and 5.
  • 3 SCATTER symbols in any position trigger 'Free Spins'.

Mystery_Symbol_textD: • Mystery Wild may appear, changing one or more positions to the same randomly chosen symbol.
Bunny_Wild_contentD: • Bunny Wild may appear, changing one or more positions to wild.

general_rule:
• Base Game has fixed 20 lines.
  • The overall game theoretical RTP is 96.01% (Base Game- 58.17% & Free Spins- 37.84%).
  • Only the highest win paid per line.
  • All wins pay left to right, except Scatters.
  • Payouts are made according to the Paytable.
  • All wins are multiplied by the bet per line.
  • Wild substitutes for all other symbols except Scatter.
  • Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
FreeSpins_Intro:
• There are 3 types of free spins, each time free spins are awarded one is chosen.

  • The types of free spins are random reveal symbols, random wild symbols or random wild reels.

  • During free spins, the pays, number of lines, and bet multiplier stay the same as the base game when triggered.
Mystery_Symbol_content: Mystery Symbol substitutes for all symbols except scatter symbol
Season_Scatter_content: 3 or more scatter symbols trigger Free Spins

Free_game_text1:
• There are 3 types of free spins, each time free spins are awarded one is chosen.

  • The types of free spins are random reveal symbols, random wild symbols or random wild reels.
Free_game_text:
• 3 SCATTER symbols appear on the Base Game trigger the Free Spins.
  • SCATTER symbol does not appear during Free Spins.
  • There are 3 types of Free Spins, each time Free Spins are awarded one is chosen at random.
mystry_text:
• "10 Free Spins".
  • Mystery Symbols changes one or more poitions to the same randomly chosen symbol.
rambol_wild_symbols_freespins_text:
• "7 Free Spins".
  • Random Wild symbols changes one or more position to wild.
  • The Random Wild symbols remain for the remainder of the Free Spins.
rambol_wild_REELS_freespins_text:
• "4 Free Spins".
  • Random Wild symbols changes one or more reels to all wild.
  • The Random Wild reels remain for the remainder of the Free Spins.
